pages.title: Brews
pages.text: Concentrated draughts brewed in the Small Cauldron. Combine up to three ingredients with a bottle to create potent effects.

pages.title: Storage & Unlocking
pages.text: Brews can be stored on the $(l:hexalia:content/functional_blocks#shelf)Shelf$(/l) for quick access.$(br2)All recipes are unlocked by obtaining a $(thing)Rustic Bottle$().

pages.title: How Brewing Works
pages.text: New to brewing? Read $(l:hexalia:core_mechanics/brewing)Brewing$(/l) for heat requirements, slots, timing, and failure conditions.
A crimson draught that stirs battle fervor. Grants $(thing)Bloodlust$(): increased damage and healing for a portion of damage dealt.$(br)XP: 5  •  Brew Time: 175t
Harden your hide with thorny vigor. Grants $(thing)Spikeskin$(): higher armor toughness and reflects part of incoming damage.$(br)XP: 5  •  Brew Time: 175t
Springy resilience in a bottle. Grants $(thing)Slimewalker$(): negates fall damage and lets you bounce upward while sneaking.$(br)XP: 5  •  Brew Time: 175t
A waystone in liquid form. On use, returns you to your $(thing)spawn point$().$(br)XP: 5  •  Brew Time: 175t
Draw the world toward you. Grants $(thing)Siphon$(): faster mining and an extended item pickup range.$(br)XP: 5  •  Brew Time: 175t
Sunlit vigor. Grants $(thing)Daybloom$(): speed and regeneration in daylight; darkness inflicts damage.$(br)XP: 5  •  Brew Time: 175t
Silken surefooting. Grants $(thing)Arachnid Grace$(): move through cobwebs, climb walls, and immunity to poison.$(br)XP: 5  •  Brew Time: 175t
